description: I have been contracting for several clients mainly using Angular, ReactJS, AngularJS, @ngrx, TypeScript, React, JavaScript, Karma/Jasmine, Jest working on mobile device web UIs (Progressive Web Apps) and multiplatform Responsive Web Design on backend using PHP and JSP with data-bases: PouchDB and MongoDB. These have been the main roles I have fulfilled during this time, also combined with smaller freelance projects.
